Services.heading: Our Excellence services
Services.subTitle: Your Digital Excellence, Visionary Consulting, Elite Talent
Services.description: From digital creativity to strategic expertise and elite talent sourcing, we turn your IT and digital ambitions into remarkable achievements.

cards.heading: Innovation & Digital
cards.description: Accelerate your digital growth, craft exceptional web and mobile experiences, captivate your customers, and optimize your digital performance.

cards.heading: IT Advisory & Strategy
cards.description: Streamline your processes, take full control of your digital transformation, and deliver IT solutions that are powerful and perfectly adapted to your market.

cards.heading: Elite IT Sourcing
cards.description: Gain access to the best experts to propel your strategic and innovative projects forward.

Expertise.heading: Our Success Stories
Expertise.description: Every project tells a story. Discover how we've transformed ambitions into concrete successes through innovative and custom digital solutions.

cards.title: Luxury resale mobile app in Dubai
cards.summary: Exclusive and secure application for a prestigious startup specializing in the resale of luxury watches, bags, and jewelry.
cards.testimonial: AURA IT enhanced our vision and created a digital experience worthy of the greatest luxury houses.

cards.title: AI application for luxury car showroom – Supercars & Collection – Doha
cards.summary: Intelligent tool for a supercar and rare vehicle dealership, featuring real-time inventory and a custom VIP CRM.
cards.testimonial: Reinvented efficiency and enhanced prestige, noticeable in every interaction.

cards.title: Premium website for Medical Practice – Rabat
cards.summary: Elegant and optimized website for a renowned medical practice, with online appointment booking and enhanced local visibility.
cards.testimonial: Increased visibility and greatly simplified patient experience.

cards.title: Showcase website redesign for a jewelry brand – Paris
cards.summary: Modernization and optimization of an e-commerce site for a prestigious jewelry house in Paris.
cards.testimonial: Our image is finally worthy of our creations.

Parteners.heading: Our Trusted Partners
Parteners.description: Leading brands and institutions who rely on us for excellence.

Locations.heading: Our Implantations
Locations.description: Present in strategic locations, AURA IT puts its digital excellence and IT expertise at your service, wherever your projects require impact.

newsletter.heading: IT Consulting & Solutions
newsletter.description: Stay updated with the latest IT insights and solutions.

Hero.title: Who We Are ?
Hero.description: Founded in 2025 by a visionary engineer from the École Centrale from Lyon, AURA IT’s mission is to redefine technological support for businesses worldwide. We unite the brightest talent, innovative strategies, and unrivaled digital expertise to propel our clients toward excellence. Combining the agility of a startup with the rigor of an international firm, we tackle the most complex technological challenges while staying close to those who trust us. More than a partner, AURA IT is the architect of your digital success.

cards.title: For our clients
attributes: Conquer your challenges: Our experts turn complexity into tangible results.
Innovate without limits: Cutting-edge digital solutions to stay ahead of the market.
Always tailor-made: Personalized strategies that maximize your impact.
Total reliability: Start-up agility + international rigor = guaranteed trust.
Build your success: We shape your lasting digital transformation.

cards.title: For our consultants
attributes: Take on exciting missions: High-impact projects and cutting-edge technologies.
Boost your skills: Continuous training, mentoring, and constant innovation.
Act and innovate: Autonomy, recognition, and a stimulating environment.
Thrive: Talent appreciation and balance between performance and life.
Make a difference: Contribute to international projects that change the game.

OurTeam.title: Meet Our Team
OurTeam.description: The soul of AURA IT is its exceptional team—visionary strategists, elite engineers, and creators of extraordinary solutions, all driven by a shared obsession to push the boundaries of what’s possible. Each member contributes rare expertise and contagious energy, coming together as an unstoppable engine of innovation. We don’t just support our clients; we reinvent their digital future with boldness, precision, and always one step ahead.

cards.name: Lamyae
cards.description: Lamyae is a visionary entrepreneur who connects IT expertise and innovation to transform ambitious businesses.

cards.name: Gulnabi
cards.description: Gulnabi is a dedicated developer who delivers practical and high-quality results. He works closely with businesses to turn their needs into smooth, working solutions.
